function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Logistics disruptions in the short run","Impact":"Supply chain delays and shortages, affecting production and distribution","Mitigation":"Diversifying suppliers, improving inventory management, and adopting technology for tracking and monitoring","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, IoT devices for tracking","People":"Manufacturing SMEs","Owner":"Management and procurement teams"},{"Description":"Structural challenges in the long run","Impact":"Permanent changes in consumer behavior and market conditions, leading to reduced demand and market adaptation challenges","Mitigation":"Market research and adaptation strategies, product diversification, and flexible production methods","Technologies":"Market analysis tools, flexible manufacturing systems","People":"Management and marketing teams","Owner":"Business strategists and market analysts"},{"Description":"Rise in cash flow risk for SMEs","Impact":"Increased risk of bankruptcy and financial crisis for SMEs","Mitigation":"Cash flow forecasting, expense optimization, and financial assistance programs","Technologies":"Financial forecasting tools, expense tracking software","People":"SME owners and financial managers","Owner":"Government and financial institutions"}]}
